detailsData.title: Experienced Personal Injury Lawyers
detailsData.content: Our team has over 20 years of experience in handling personal injury cases. We have a proven track record of success and have recovered millions of dollars for our clients.

detailsData.title: No Fee Unless We Win
detailsData.content: We understand that dealing with a personal injury can be costly. That's why we work on a contingency fee basis. You don't pay us anything unless we win your case!

detailsData.title: Compassionate and Personalized Service
detailsData.content: We know that dealing with a personal injury can be a stressful and emotional time. That's why we provide compassionate and personalized service to each of our clients.

detailsData.title: Free Consultation
detailsData.content: We offer a free consultation to discuss your case and answer any questions you may have. Contact us today to schedule your free consultation.

address: 2129 North Cherry Road, Rock Hill, South Carolina 29732, United States
valueProp: Our team of experienced attorneys have been successfully handling personal injury cases for over 20 years. We have a proven track record of winning cases and securing maximum compensation for our clients. Client satisfaction is our top priority. We work closely with our clients to understand their needs and concerns and provide personalized legal representation to ensure the best possible outcome for their case.

testimonalData.text: Matt is my go to lawyer. He has been there for me and so many of my teammates over the years.
testimonalData.author: Dwight Gooden

testimonalData.text: Matt is a strategic thinker and really knows how to analyze and formulate a litigation game plan.
testimonalData.author: Phil Regan

testimonalData.text: I heard other players saying amazing things about Matt and now I know for myself that it's all true as he never quits until the catch is made!
testimonalData.author: Endy Chavez, NY Mets Player
